content: I/O upgrade You can concurrently add I/O features to IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ configurations if unused I/O slot positions are available.  Concurrent PCIe+ I/O drawer upgrade Additional PCIe+ I/O drawers can be installed concurrently if free frame slots for the PCIe+ I/O drawers and PCIe fanouts in the CPC drawer are available.  Dynamic I/O configuration Dynamic I/O configuration supports the dynamic addition, removal, or modification of the channel path, control units, and I/O devices without a planned outage. Note: Unless specified otherwise, PCIe refers to PCIe Generation 3 in remaining sections of this chapter. 1 The link speeds do not represent the performance of the link. The performance depends on many factors, including latency through the adapters, cable lengths, and the type of workload. Chapter 4.
